frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-media-controls
frozen.shortDescription: Show controls and information of the currently playing media in the panel.
frozen.longDescription:
Show controls and information of the currently playing media in the panel.

    - Highly customizable
    - Support GNOME 3.36(beta) , 3.38, 40, 41
    - Caches album art
    - Control every element in the extension
